CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 13, 1953, pg. 1 reads: "The Courier's second annual Home Service air opened Tuesday to a packed house...Held at Ammon Recreation Center..."
TitMainTitle: Crowd of men and women in Ammon Center for 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Ammon Center (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.
